name: oligogym-datasets-collection
description: A collection of GZIP-compressed CSV datasets from the Roche/oligogym project, focused on oligonucleotide drug discovery. Each dataset is described by its own RecordSet and FileSet.

distribution.name: oligogym-github-repository
distribution.description: Roche repository on GitHub for oligogym, containing various datasets for oligonucleotide drug discovery.

distribution.name: Hwang_2024_1_processed_csv_gz_file
distribution.description: GZIP-compressed CSV file: Hwang_2024_1_processed.csv.gz for the Hwang_2024_1_processed dataset, hosted on the oligogym GitHub repository.

distribution.name: McQuisten_2007_1_processed_csv_gz_file
distribution.description: GZIP-compressed CSV file: McQuisten_2007_1_processed.csv.gz for the McQuisten_2007_1_processed dataset, hosted on the oligogym GitHub repository.

distribution.name: Alharbi_2020_1_processed_csv_gz_file
distribution.description: GZIP-compressed CSV file: Alharbi_2020_1_processed.csv.gz for the Alharbi_2020_1_processed dataset, hosted on the oligogym GitHub repository.

distribution.name: Ichihara_2007_2_processed_csv_gz_file
distribution.description: GZIP-compressed CSV file: Ichihara_2007_2_processed.csv.gz for the Ichihara_2007_2_processed dataset, hosted on the oligogym GitHub repository.

distribution.name: Alharbi_2020_2_processed_csv_gz_file
distribution.description: GZIP-compressed CSV file: Alharbi_2020_2_processed.csv.gz for the Alharbi_2020_2_processed dataset, hosted on the oligogym GitHub repository.

distribution.name: Ichihara_2007_1_processed_csv_gz_file
distribution.description: GZIP-compressed CSV file: Ichihara_2007_1_processed.csv.gz for the Ichihara_2007_1_processed dataset, hosted on the oligogym GitHub repository.

distribution.name: MOE_Neurotox_1_processed_csv_gz_file
distribution.description: GZIP-compressed CSV file: MOE_Neurotox_1_processed.csv.gz for the MOE_Neurotox_1_processed dataset, hosted on the oligogym GitHub repository.

distribution.name: Martinelli_2023_1_processed_csv_gz_file
distribution.description: GZIP-compressed CSV file: Martinelli_2023_1_processed.csv.gz for the Martinelli_2023_1_processed dataset, hosted on the oligogym GitHub repository.

distribution.name: Knott_2014_1_processed_csv_gz_file
distribution.description: GZIP-compressed CSV file: Knott_2014_1_processed.csv.gz for the Knott_2014_1_processed dataset, hosted on the oligogym GitHub repository.

distribution.name: Papargyri_2020_1_processed_csv_gz_file
distribution.description: GZIP-compressed CSV file: Papargyri_2020_1_processed.csv.gz for the Papargyri_2020_1_processed dataset, hosted on the oligogym GitHub repository.

distribution.name: Shmushkovich_2018_1_processed_csv_gz_file
distribution.description: GZIP-compressed CSV file: Shmushkovich_2018_1_processed.csv.gz for the Shmushkovich_2018_1_processed dataset, hosted on the oligogym GitHub repository.

distribution.name: Hagedorn_2022_1_processed_csv_gz_file
distribution.description: GZIP-compressed CSV file: Hagedorn_2022_1_processed.csv.gz for the Hagedorn_2022_1_processed dataset, hosted on the oligogym GitHub repository.

recordSet.name: Hwang_2024_1_processed
recordSet.description: A collection of inhibitory activity for different gapmers ASO collected from various patents and publication

field.name: x
field.description: Input sequence stored as HELM notation.

field.name: y
field.description: Percentage inhibition of target mRNA relative to untreated controls

field.name: csv_gz_filename
field.description: The name of the source GZIP-compressed CSV file for this record.

recordSet.name: McQuisten_2007_1_processed
recordSet.description: An ASO-activity dataset collected by IDT from a now defunct ASO database (https://doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/16.9.843) and also from patent data. According to the publication each ASO have a full phosphothioate backbone and no chimeric sequences.

field.name: x
field.description: Input sequence stored as HELM notation.

field.name: y
field.description: Activity range from 0 (complete target inhibition) to  1 (no difference in target activity when compared to appropriate control). The activity were all measured from either protein product or direct mRNA level.

field.name: csv_gz_filename
field.description: The name of the source GZIP-compressed CSV file for this record.

field.name: x
field.description: Input sequence stored as HELM notation.

field.name: y
field.description: TLR8 level after induction with 100nM ASO as measured by fluorescence as using NF-κB-Luciferase reporter in HEK293-TLR8 cells. Values relative to those obtained after induction with Resiquimod (=1.0)

field.name: csv_gz_filename
field.description: The name of the source GZIP-compressed CSV file for this record.

recordSet.name: Ichihara_2007_2_processed
recordSet.description: A precurated collection of unmodified siRNA potency data. The dataset can be split into two. Ichihara_2007_2 is a dataset from 5 different studies with different assays so its likely the quality is worse than Ichihara_2007_1.

field.name: x
field.description: Input sequence stored as HELM notation.

field.name: y
field.description: Percentage inhibition relative to control from various assays as reported by authors of the curated dataset.

field.name: csv_gz_filename
field.description: The name of the source GZIP-compressed CSV file for this record.

field.name: x
field.description: Input sequence stored as HELM notation.

field.name: y
field.description: TLR7 level after induction with 100nM ASO as measured by fluorescence as using NF-κB-Luciferase reporter in HEK293-TLR7 cells. Values relative to those obtained after induction with Resiquimod (=100)

field.name: csv_gz_filename
field.description: The name of the source GZIP-compressed CSV file for this record.

recordSet.name: Ichihara_2007_1_processed
recordSet.description: A precurated collection of unmodified siRNA potency data. The dataset can be split into two. Ichihara_2007_1 is a dataset from Huesken_2005 of siRNA screen using GFP reporter assay.

field.name: x
field.description: Input sequence stored as HELM notation.

field.name: y
field.description: Percentage inhibition relative to control using an eCFP-eYFP dual reporter assay.

field.name: csv_gz_filename
field.description: The name of the source GZIP-compressed CSV file for this record.

recordSet.name: MOE_Neurotox_1_processed
recordSet.description: Acute neurotox data for MOE modifed ASOs scraped from patent

field.name: x
field.description: Input sequence stored as HELM notation.

field.name: y
field.description: Rounded 3h FOB score in mice (7 categories: 0 (safe) > 7(toxic))

field.name: csv_gz_filename
field.description: The name of the source GZIP-compressed CSV file for this record.

recordSet.name: Martinelli_2023_1_processed
recordSet.description: A curated siRNA potency dataset that contain only sugar and base information.

field.name: x
field.description: Input sequence stored as HELM notation.

field.name: y
field.description: Percentage knockdown of the target mRNA

field.name: csv_gz_filename
field.description: The name of the source GZIP-compressed CSV file for this record.

recordSet.name: Knott_2014_1_processed
recordSet.description: A biased screening of shRNA using the miR-30 scaffold, DSIR algorithm was used to select for sequences likely to be active

field.name: x
field.description: Input sequence stored as HELM notation.

field.name: y
field.description: MinMax-scaled score from the raw score obtained from a high-throughput assay based on sort-seq strategy using fluorescence reporter construct with the target site in the 3UTR of the reporter gene.

field.name: csv_gz_filename
field.description: The name of the source GZIP-compressed CSV file for this record.

recordSet.name: Papargyri_2020_1_processed
recordSet.description: A study looking at the relationship between nucleobase and LNA sequence on aso activity and cytotoxicity.

field.name: x
field.description: Input sequence stored as HELM notation.

field.name: y
field.description: Minmax-scaled average caspase level (N=3) measured in HeLa cells

field.name: csv_gz_filename
field.description: The name of the source GZIP-compressed CSV file for this record.

recordSet.name: Shmushkovich_2018_1_processed
recordSet.description: Study of cholesterol-conjugated siRNA efficacy using dual luciferase reporter in HeLa cells at 1 μM

field.name: x
field.description: Input sequence stored as HELM notation.

field.name: y
field.description: Percentage remaining relative to control of siRNA measured using dual luciferase reporter in HeLa cells at 1 μM

field.name: csv_gz_filename
field.description: The name of the source GZIP-compressed CSV file for this record.

recordSet.name: Hagedorn_2022_1_processed
recordSet.description: Acute nuerotox of LNA gapmer as measured by calcium oscillation score in cell

field.name: x
field.description: Input sequence stored as HELM notation.

field.name: csv_gz_filename
field.description: The name of the source GZIP-compressed CSV file for this record.
